ID: Whenever variable_3 becomes true; the system must ensure that variable_2 has always remained less than or equal to variable_5 throughout the entire preceding operation period. For example; in an autonomous drone; if variable_3 indicates that the drone is entering landing mode; then variable_2 (such as descent rate) must have consistently stayed within the safe threshold defined by variable_5 during all prior flight moments.
